text: Giorgio Carta (16 January 1938 â€“ 28 October 2020) was an Italian doctor and politician. He was born in Jerzu, Italy. He was a member of the Italian Democratic Socialist Party. from 1992 to 1994 and again from 2006 to 2008, he was a member of the Chamber of Deputies. Cart died on 28 October 2020 in Cagliari, Italy at the age of 82.Addio a Giorgio Carta, ex deputato e presidente onorario Psdi ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Sardinia Category:Italian physicians
title: Giorgio Carta
